comment: Part of ability 206. Vehicle - Get Turbo Boost ; Causes a vehicle to gain turbo boost, while this character is inside; 201. Turbo Boost ; Vehicle active ability, increases speeed temporarily
Part of ability 217. Vehicle - Get Vehicle Stealth ; Causes a vehicle to gain stealth slotted, while this character is inside

Part of ability 219. Vehicle - Get Jump Booster ; Causes a vehicle to get Jump Booster, when this player gets inside; 23. Jump Booster ; Causes the vehicle to jump in the air; There's also alt name: Rocket Boost
Part of ability 221. Vehicle - Get Repair Surge ; Causes a vehicle to get Repair Surge, when this player gets inside; 100. Repair Surge ; Causes this vehicle to repair itself
Part of ability 230. Vehicle - Get Shield Recharge (not ready) ; Causes a vehicle to get Shield Recharge, when this player gets inside; 231. Shield Recharger ; Recharges the vehicle's shields
Apply of effect 7367. Target Arcfolding To Destination
